## Review Guideline

| Type of Comment | Emoji          | Description                         |
|-----------------|----------------|-------------------------------------|
| Blocking        | 🔴 ❌ 🚨        | RED                                 |
| Non-blocking    | 🟡 💡 🤔 💭    | Yellow, thinking, etc               |
| Praise          | 🟢 💚 😍 👍 🙌 | Green, hearts, positive emojis, etc |
